content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you could make it. Well, I'm sure you can see that the apartment is in prime condition and in a great location. I'm looking for nothing less than 1500 Euro per month. Let's see if we can find an agreement on that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the modern and central location of the apartment but find the proposed price a bit steep for my budget. I'm a responsible individual and would take excellent care of the property, however, I'm searching for a more moderate rental cost. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because a lower and more affordable range is essential for me. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
